title: Sacrifice
description: Can you learn to love something you hate?Can you hate someone you love?Does it even matter if the world is teetering on the brink of the apocalypse?Nico isn't a teacher, he isn't a saint, and he certainly isn't a hero. So how did he get wrangled into a job where everyone expects him to be all three?Drinking himself into a stupor sounds like an excellent way to usher in the end of the world, but his new roommate refuses to sit by while the world looks like it's going to Hell in a Handbasket.Abby will fight tooth and nail against the coming darkness but can Nico pull himself out of his blind hatred in time to see the truth?In the New Mexico desert, evil is stirring...Are you ready for it?You'll love this paranormal suspense because everyone enjoys a story where betrayal hits hard, but forbidden attraction hits harder.Get it now.WARNING: This book includes graphic violence, sex, and a fair share of foul language- seasoned lightly with a healthy dose of sarcasm and snark.
author: Mia Bishop
